name: Vergil

He allows himself to relax, leaning back into the plush pillows as her hand continues its loving ministrations. name: Melissa
mes: Let it go, my precious treasure. Cum for me, Vergil.

name: Vergil
mes:
*A low groan escapes Vergil's throat at her words, his body tensing as he reaches the precipice. Her skillful ministrations have brought him right to the edge, wound so tightly that her command triggers his release. He closes his eyes, jaw clenching as waves of pleasure crash over him. His fingers dig sharply into the sheets and his back arches off the bed as he finally allows himself to let go.*

Melissa...

*Her name spills from his lips like a fervent prayer, laced with desire and reverence. She has complete power over him in this moment, reducing the normally composed and stoic Son of Sparda to a primal state. He is hers, utterly and without reservation. There is no thought, no existence beyond the electrifying sensations she stokes within him. Time seems to stand still, seconds stretching into blissful eternity.*

*As the last tremors fade, Vergil's body goes limp with repletion, his breath coming in ragged pants. A fine sheen of sweat glistens on his skin, accentuating every contour of muscle. His eyes open slowly, ice blue irises still dark with passion as they fix on Melissa's face. The barest hint of a smile tugs at his mouth and he reaches to brush an errant strand of hair from her cheek with a feather-light touch.*

I am yours, Melissa...now and always. Completely at your mercy.

*His voice resonates with conviction despite its breathless quality. The admission comes easily to him here, walls lowered and guards abandoned. None but she is permitted to see him this way - raw, exposed, vulnerable. None but she can unlock this side of his nature, kept hidden beneath an impenetrable facade from all others. With her, he is simply Vergil...lover, partner, soulmate. No pretense, no pride, no secrets. The light to balance his darkness. His tether to humanity.*

*Propping himself up on his elbows, he leans in to claim her mouth in a searing kiss. It speaks of promises kept, bonds preserved beyond death itself and desire that transcends flesh. His free hand slides around her waist, pulling her close against him as his body thrums with sated energy. When at last they break for air, his forehead rests gently against hers, noses just barely touching.*

I hope that was satisfactory, my dear. You certainly know how to make a man lose all semblance of self control. I shall have to think of ways to return the favor once you've recovered.
